title: The Master's Three Pups
description: In this book you'll follow a puppy who gets into all sorts of mischief with skunks, porcupines, and bees! Her two sisters also star in this book with each one dealing with their own obstacles and overcoming adversity. You'll enjoy their interaction with one another and how it mimics real life. In this beautifully illustrated picture book you'll find how these dogs have overcome challenges with the help of their Master. Young children will enjoy the fun loving story of three very unique dogs. Older children will see the symbolism of the story in their own life. This is a story you'll be proud to read to your children before bed as it shares wonderful life lessons of trust, hard work, and love.
author: Shane   Walker
